metadata.name: ReceivedMessage
metadata.description:
ReceivedMessage

Represents a Pub/Sub Message that can be acknowledged or delayed.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

sub = pubsub.subscription "my-topic-sub"
received_message = sub.pull.first
if received_message
  puts received_message.message.data
  received_message.acknowledge!
end

metadata.name: message_id
metadata.description: The ID of the received message, assigned by the server at publication time. Guaranteed to be unique within the topic.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

sub = pubsub.subscription "my-topic-sub"
received_message = sub.pull.first
if received_message
  puts received_message.message.data
  received_message.acknowledge!
end

metadata.name: delay!
metadata.description:
Modifies the acknowledge deadline for the message.

This indicates that more time is needed to process the message, or to make the message available for redelivery.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

sub = pubsub.subscription "my-topic-sub"
received_message = sub.pull.first
if received_message
  puts received_message.message.data
  # Delay for 2 minutes
  received_message.delay! 120
end

params.name: new_deadline
params.description: The new ack deadline in seconds from the time this request is sent to the Pub/Sub system. Must be >= 0. For example, if the value is 10, the new ack deadline will expire 10 seconds after the call is made. Specifying 0 may immediately make the message available for another pull request.

metadata.name: ensure_subscription!
metadata.description: Raise an error unless an active subscription is available.
